title: Bug 11280 [View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
OB: When switching between perspectives, the maximized state of the CVS repository view is lost.
SR: 1. Open the CVS repository view in the Java perspective. 2. Double click the title bar to maximize the view. 3. Switch to the resource perspective. 4. Return to the Java perspective and observe that the CVS repository view is no longer maximized.
